Reviews.Title: This Laptop was all I needed
Reviews.Author: Temesgen Hailemariam Dadi
Reviews.Content: The laptop functions properly. No single fault in it. The price is fair and the performance is great. I made the right decision buying this item.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money. Lots of extras, only thing it could have had a lit keyboard, even raised keys help though.
Reviews.Author: Keith Daniel McNeil
Reviews.Content: Like I said. Be a perfect economically sound machine. Just needs those lit up keys! Still like my sleek Toshiba :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-3337U Processor
6GB DDR3 1600MHz memory
Intel Integrated Graphics
500GB HDD (5400rpm, Serial ATA)
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 15.6" Satellite Laptop 6GB 500GB | L55-A5226
